long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically check what streams to watch for a given game and obtain all the drops with-in the time frame of the drop campaign

Features
- When starting a drops campaign, it will got through all the available streams and watch them for you. There are a few channels that the extension will prioritize, such as the twitchrivals channel.

- Clicking on the extension in Chrome, you can monitor the progress of the extension and your drops.

- If you want a specific drop you can start the drop campaign for that drop to get it before other ones (This can be done before the drop campaign begins and the extension will handle it for you in the Premium version).

With Premium ($2.50/Month)
The premium version allows the extension to prioritize streams that you set beforehand automatically. Also, if you're stuck at work or school at the beginning of a drop campaign, the extension will begin automatically while you're away. The has to be done manually in the free version. Lastly, premium enables the extension to claim channel points for you while watching!
